title: Flying!
body:
Wow. Maybe it isn't all that bad.. I mean, now I can fly around in my own hot air balloon! After days and days of working, I've finally gotten it functioning!
    It works great, and now I can go pretty much anywhere! Thats pretty good, isn't it? The Spirit told me about dungeoning, and that I can go off and find certain dungeons, like a pirate ship just like the one I escaped from!
    Who knows.. it may be the one.
